slides.title: ESReadWrite
slides.description: Learning to read and write has never been so fun. Explore stories, fables, poems and more, while you play, level up and earn rewards for your effort. A platform made for students, families and teachers who believe in the power of reading!

slides.title: Stories
slides.description: Immerse yourself in a world of adventures, magic and unforgettable characters. Stories invite you to imagine, dream and learn while enjoying every page.

slides.title: Fables
slides.description: Short stories with great teachings. Fables, through animals and fun situations, transmit values that you will never forget.

slides.title: Poems
slides.description: Let words come to life in verses full of rhythm, emotion and beauty. Poetry invites you to feel and dream.

slides.title: Legends
slides.description: Discover the stories that are part of our history and culture. Legends hold mysteries, traditions and unique learnings.

slides.title: Riddles
slides.description: Test your wit with fun puzzles that will challenge your mind and make your imagination soar.

slides.title: Comics
slides.description: Illustrated stories full of color and fun. Learn and laugh while accompanying unique characters on their adventures.

slides.title: Tongue Twisters
slides.description: Challenge your pronunciation and have fun playing with words. The faster you try, the more fun it will be!

slides.title: Sayings
slides.description: Small phrases with great truths. Sayings contain the wisdom of generations in few words.
